name: Which Wire
description:
You are Bomb - Guy. You have just started your first day on the job as an official 'Bomb Defuser'. It is your role to safely defuse all bombs brought in by un-satisfied customers. Get through the day as safely, and quickly, as possible! Sounds simple enough!

-originally made for the 'Indies vs Gamers' game jam, some technical difficulties meant we were a minute late on submission-

Made by Incinious: Hazzard993, Infernobomb
http://incinious.tumblr.com/
